member.name: WS_XML_COMMENT_NODE
member.summary: Represents a comment. (For example, <!--The message follows-->)

member.name: WS_XML_COMMENT_NODE.node
member.summary: The base type for all types that derive from .

member.name: WS_XML_COMMENT_NODE.value
member.summary: The textual content of the comment. In the example, it is the string "The message follows".
